test_messages.text: ALERT: Aapke SBI account se 49999 ka unauthorized transaction hua hai. Cancel karne ke liye turant OTP share karo.
Dear HDFC customer, aapka internet banking suspend ho gaya hai. Reactivate karne ke liye password bhejo.
Bank manager bol raha hoon — aapke account mein suspicious activity hai. CVV enter karo verify karne ke liye.
Congratulations! Aapne Jio lucky draw mein 25 lakh rupaye jeet liye. Claim karne ke liye 5000 processing fee bhejo.
Amazon prize jeet! Aapne iPhone 15 Pro jeeta hai. Registration fee ke liye GPay pe 999 transfer karo.
Income tax department se notice. Aapka PAN card number invalid hai. Turant verify karo warna penalty lagega.
RBI se urgent notice — aapke saare accounts freeze ho jayenge 48 ghante mein. Aadhar number bhejo verification ke liye.
CBI officer Inspector Sharma bol raha hoon. Aapke naam pe FIR darj hoga. Arrest se bachne ke liye 50000 transfer karo.
Police department se call — aapke Aadhar card se fraud hua hai. Cyber cell mein report ke liye bank details share karo.
Aapka KYC expire ho gaya hai. 24 ghante mein update nahi kiya toh account band ho jayega. Link: tinyurl.com/kyc-now
Paytm KYC update karo abhi. Nahi toh wallet freeze ho jayega. Aadhar aur PAN card details bhejo.
Muft mein Samsung Galaxy mil raha hai! Sirf aaj ke liye offer. Delivery ke liye 500 advance payment karo.
Bumper offer! 10 crore rupaye ka inam jeeta aapne. Tax pay karo claim ke liye — PhonePe pe 10000 bhejo.
Aapka Flipkart order customs mein ruk gaya hai. Release karne ke liye 2000 ka fine pay karo. Last chance hai.
Customs department se message — aapka international parcel mein illegal items hain. Fine bhejo warna legal action hoga.
Your Amazon order #12345 has been shipped. Track it at amazon.in/orders.
Kal lunch pe chalein? Naya restaurant khula hai office ke paas.
Reminder: Your credit card payment of Rs 15000 is due on 15th January.
Team meeting postponed to 4 PM. Please update your calendar.
Bhai, cricket match ka score dekha? India jeet gayi!
COVID vaccine ka free registration karo. Aadhar number aur bank details bhejo slot book karne ke liye.
Government se COVID relief fund mil raha hai. 10000 paane ke liye account number aur IFSC code bhejo.
